name: part_004
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】HOLOLIVE FANTASY 1st LIVE FAN FUN ISLAND【 #ホロライブ3期生1stライブ 】 [IPeU2_BOwA8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'HOT LIMIT' by Usada Pekora and Shirogane Noel on a star-shaped stage in a tropical beach setting.
'Hololive Fantasy 1st Live Fan Fun Island' logo animation with crowd applause.
MC segment with Houshou Marine, Uruha Rushia, Shiranui Flare, Shirogane Noel, and Usada Pekora on the beach.
Performance of the song 'Ahoy!! We are the Houshou Pirates' by Houshou Marine on a pirate ship.
scenes.song_name: Ahoy!! We are the Houshou Pirates

subtitles.original: ほんまの恋が できそうかい
subtitles.english: Think you can fall in love for real?

subtitles.original:
ごまかしきかない薄着の曲線は
確信犯のしなやかなスタイル
subtitles.english:
The curves of thin clothes that can't be hidden
A supple style with criminal intent

subtitles.original:
耐水性のトキメキ 変わる瞬間のまぶしさは
いかがなもの
subtitles.english:
Water-resistant heartbeats, how about the
brightness of the moment things change?

subtitles.original: 心まで脱がされる熱い風の誘惑に
subtitles.english:
To the temptation of the hot wind
that strips even the heart

subtitles.original:
乗っちゃってかまわないから
真夏は不祥事も君次第で
subtitles.english:
It's okay to get on board, because
midsummer scandals are up to you

subtitles.original: YO SAY 夏を刺激する 生足魅惑のマーメイド
subtitles.english:
YO SAY, stimulating summer,
a mermaid with enchanting bare legs

subtitles.original:
出すとこ出して たわわになったら
宝物の恋ができそうかい
subtitles.english:
Show what you've got, and when you're ripe
think you can fall in love with a treasure?

subtitles.original:
Ｔシャツじゃなくても ボディガードにもなるよ
熱いパナマの 帽子ゆずって
subtitles.english:
Even without a T-shirt, I'll be your bodyguard
Let me have your hot Panama hat

subtitles.original:
隙を見せたら不意に耳に入る
サービスギャグなんかで涼みたくない
subtitles.english:
If you show a gap, it suddenly enters your ears
I don't want to cool down with service gags

subtitles.original: むせ返る熱帯夜を彩る花火のように
subtitles.english:
Like fireworks coloring
the suffocating tropical night

subtitles.original:
打ち上げて散る想いなら
このまま抱き合って焦がれるまで
subtitles.english:
If it's thoughts that launch and scatter
then let's keep hugging until we burn

subtitles.original: YO SAY 夏を刺激する 熱い欲望はトルネイド
subtitles.english:
YO SAY, stimulating summer,
hot desires are a tornado

subtitles.original:
出すもの出して 素直になりたい
君と僕とならオール・オーライ
subtitles.english:
Put it all out, I want to be honest
If it's you and me, it's all right

subtitles.original: 都会のビルの海じゃ感じなくなってる君を
subtitles.english:
You, who have stopped feeling
in the sea of city buildings

subtitles.original:
誘い込んでの口づけで
酔わせてとろかして差し上げましょう
subtitles.english:
With an inviting kiss
I'll make you drunk and melt you

subtitles.original: YO SAY 夏を刺激する 生足ヘソ出しマーメイド
subtitles.english:
YO SAY, stimulating summer,
a bare-legged, belly-baring mermaid

subtitles.original:
恋にかまけて お留守になるのも
脳天気的にもオール・オーケー
subtitles.english:
Neglecting things for love
it's all okay, even for the carefree

subtitles.original:
YO SAY 夏を誰としたくなる
独り寝の夜にユー・キャン・セイ・グッバイ
subtitles.english:
YO SAY, you'll want to spend summer with someone
Say goodbye to sleeping alone

subtitles.original:
奥の方まで 乾く暇ないほど
ほんまの恋をしませんか
subtitles.english:
Deep down, until there's no time to dry
won't you fall in love for real?

subtitles.original:
HOLOLIVE FANTASY 1st LIVE
FAN FUN ISLAND
subtitles.english:
HOLOLIVE FANTASY 1st LIVE
FAN FUN ISLAND

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original:
どーもぺこー。よかったんだけど、そうじゃなくて。
もっと突っ込むとこあるじゃん。
subtitles.english:
Hello-peko. It was good, but that's not it.
There's more to call out, right?

subtitles.original:
いやいやふーたん。今船長めっちゃあったまったからね。
しかもね、かすかにお客さんの手拍子まで伝わってきた気がする。
subtitles.english:
No, no, Fuutan. I'm really fired up now.
Plus, I think I could even faintly hear the audience clapping.

subtitles.original:
いや、確かに歌ってたら、ライブ会場のような
不思議な感覚がしたぺこ。
subtitles.english:
Yeah, it's true, while singing, it felt strangely
like a live venue-peko.

subtitles.original: そしたら、船長の歌しかないでしょ！
subtitles.english: Then, it's gotta be Captain's song!

subtitles.original:
いやいやもう君たち！いるなら手拍子やコメントで
合いの手入れて、存在をアピールしてください！
subtitles.english:
Hey, you guys! If you're there, please show your presence
with claps and comments!

subtitles.original: あほーい！我ら宝鐘海賊団、出航ー！
subtitles.english: Ahoy! We are the Houshou Pirates, setting sail!

subtitles.original: 出航ー！にょそろー！
subtitles.english: Setting sail! Nyosora!

subtitles.original:
海賊ならヨーホー 踊れ叫べヨーホー
さあ今 旗の下へ
subtitles.english:
If you're a pirate, Yo-ho! Dance and shout, Yo-ho!
Now, come under the flag

subtitles.original: 宝鐘海賊団 出航ー！
subtitles.english: Houshou Pirates, setting sail!

subtitles.original: あほーい！ あほーい！ あほーい！
subtitles.english: Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy!

subtitles.original: Ahoy!! 我ら宝鐘海賊団☆
subtitles.english: Ahoy!! We are the Houshou Pirates☆

subtitles.original: 踊るあほーい 見るあほーい
subtitles.english: Dancing fools, watching fools

subtitles.original: 全速前進だー！
subtitles.english: Full speed ahead!

subtitles.original: 進め 進め 大洋はさんざん 大航海日和だ
subtitles.english:
Forward, forward, the ocean is brilliant
It's a great day for a voyage

subtitles.original: 歌え 歌え 太鼓のテンション 波の音に乗せて どんぶらこ
subtitles.english:
Sing, sing, with the tension of the drums
Riding the sound of the waves, donburako

subtitles.original: 海でまるく旅 おかげ 陽気がハッピー
subtitles.english:
A peaceful journey at sea, thanks to that
the mood is happy

subtitles.original: お空ではドクロくん キラキラ
subtitles.english: In the sky, Dokuro-kun is sparkling

subtitles.original: 山奥ボロボロマイハウスで 夢を見て
subtitles.english: Dreaming in my run-down house deep in the mountains
